name: PCKG_ISSUE
body_snippet:
package body PCKG_ISSUE is

FUNCTION FUN_GET_PERIOD_ID(parm_sob_id NUMBER,
                           parm_from_date DATE,
                           parm_to_date DATE) RETURN NUMBER IS
      
      lnum_period_id NUMBER;
      lnum_period_freeze_yn NUMBER;
      
BEGIN
      FOR PERIOD_CUR IN(SELECT PD.PERIOD_ID
                        FROM   WIZ_GL_SET_OF_BOOKS WGSOB,
                               PERIOD_DETAILS PD
                        WHERE  WGSOB.PERD_TYPE_ID = PD.PERIOD_TYPE_ID
                        AND    WGSOB.SET_OF_BOOK_ID = parm_sob_id
                        AND    ((PARM_FROM_DATE BETWEEN PD.FROM_DATE AND PD.TO_DATE)
                        OR     (PARM_TO_DATE BETWEEN PD.FROM_DATE AND PD.TO_DATE)))LOOP
                        
          BEGIN
              SELECT FREEZE_YN INTO lnum_period_freeze_yn
              FROM period_freezing_mt mt
              WHERE   (mt.period_id ) = PERIOD_CUR.PERIOD_ID;
              
              RETURN(lnum_period_freeze_yn);
          EXCEPTION
              WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
                  RETURN(0);
          END;
          
      END LOOP;

END;

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PROCEDURE PRO_ISSUE_POSTING(parm_issue_id      NUMBER,
                            parm_book_id       NUMBER,
                            parm_from_date     DATE,
                            parm_to_date       DATE,
                            parm_period_id     NUMBER,
